name: Hidden Canyon
description:
Introduction

Due to a massive rock fall in 2019 that has closed the lower portion of the West Rim Trail and also part of the Hidden Canyon trail, the park is not currently issuing permits for this canyon--nor is it accessible via the Hidden Canyon hiking trail.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Entry to this area may be restricted; check for information regarding permits before attempting this trip

Beta sites

  • BluuGnome.com : Hidden Canyon
  • CanyoneeringUSA.com : Hidden
  • RoadTripRyan.com : Hidden Canyon From the Top
  • Zion Canyoneering Book by Tom Jones : Hidden Canyon from the Top

 - The Zion Park trail was relocated circa 2010, making the approach beta in the book wrong. Several parties entered Grotto Canyon by mistake, and required rescue to get out. 
 - Please check the CanyoneeringUSA website for up to date beta.  (Other sources may also be incorrect). READING a map is recommended.

  • Super Amazing Map : Hidden Canyon
  • AmericanSouthwest.net : Hidden Canyon
  • HikeArizona.com : Hidden Canyon
  • ZionCanyoneering.com : Hidden Canyon from the Top
  • SummitPost.org : Hidden Canyon

Trip reports and media

  • Candition.com : Hidden Canyon

Background

properties.name: Leave Trail
properties.description: Leave the trail approximately here to route find your way over to the top of Hidden Canyon. Hidden canyon is about 0.2 miles to the west of this point. There are no helpful landmarks for this point so a GPS is helpful but not manditory. Leave the trail here and travel west a little over 100 feet to the top of the cliff band. If you left the trail in the correct spot you will find a slope gentle enough to allow you to walk / scramble down to the bottom of the cliff band. If you left in the wrong spot you may be cliffed out and need to wander along the top of the cliff band to find the way down. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R1
properties.description: Rap 1 in Hidden Canyon. 100 feet Anchored from Pine Tree. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R2
properties.description: Rap 2 in Hidden Canyon. 35 feet Anchored from small boulder. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R3-4
properties.description: Raps 3 - 4 in Hidden Canyon. Rap 3; 35 feet anchored from small boulder. Rap 4; 2 stage (20 and 15 feet) with 50 feet between stages. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R5
properties.description: Rap 5 in Hidden Canyon. 30 feet Anchored from tree in the wash. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R6
properties.description: Rap 6 in Hidden Canyon. 60 feet Anchored from tree. Awkward start. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: R7
properties.description: Rap 7 in Hidden Canyon. 60 feet Anchored from Pine Tree. Natural arch just down canyon. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: Down Climb
properties.description: Climb around large area of canyon RDC. Nice path leading up and over. (Data by bluugnome.com)

properties.name: Arch
properties.description: Arch large enough to walk under LDC on the canyon floor. Feels very leprechaun like. (Data by bluugnome.com)
